participant_1.background:
My family and business are my top priorities.
I remember buying a video game console so I can play with my son.
I like to spend my days reading and watching documentaries to learn more about the world.
i am a librarian.
I'm always trying to come up with new beats for my band.

participant_2.background:
I cannot be a florist because I would not be able to see the colors of the flowers.
I am not a student, but I am always looking for new ways to challenge myself.
I am a stay-at-home mom who loves to make my family proud by decorating for Christmas and other holidays.
i enjoy my job , as a teacher.
i am italian american.

content.text: Hello, I am doing well, thank you! How are you today?
I am doing well, thanks! I am a librarian, and I enjoy reading and watching documentaries to learn more about the world.
That sounds like a great job! I am a stay-at-home mom who loves to make my family proud by decorating for Christmas and other holidays.
That is wonderful! I am sure your family loves your decorations.
Thanks! I do my best to make them special.
I love Christmas! I love the decorations, the music, and the food.
Me too! Christmas is my favorite holiday as well.
What are some of your favorite Christmas traditions?
I love to decorate the tree with my family, and I love to bake Christmas cookies.
Those are both great traditions! I love baking Christmas cookies as well.
What is your favorite Christmas cookie recipe?
I love to make chocolate chip cookies with red and green M&Ms.
That sounds delicious! I love chocolate chip cookies.
